Morocco-Hespress.title: ترامب يحذر المحكمة العليا الأمريكية
Morocco-Hespress.description: صرح الرئيس الأمريكي دونالد ترامب، اليوم الثلاثاء، بأن أي حكم سلبي قد تصدره المحكمة العليا الأمريكية يتعلق بالرسوم الجمركية التي فرضها ضد دول عديدة سيكون “أكبر تهديد للأمن القومي الأمريكي”.

Nigeria.title: Nigerian state secures release of 100 out of 265 kidnapped schoolchildren
Nigeria.description: Gunmen abducted 315 pupils and staff last month from St Mary’s school in Niger state as part of spate of kidnappingsNigerian authorities have secured the release of 100 kidnapped schoolchildren

Nigeria.title: 100 kidnapped children freed in Nigeria
Nigeria.description: Nigeria has rescued 100 children who were abducted by gunmen from St Mary’s Catholic School in Niger state last month.

Nigeria.title: 100 Nigerian students rescued: No comment on negotiations or ransom
Nigeria.description: Nigeria's government on Monday rescued 100 schoolchildren abducted last month from a Catholic school in Niger state, in one of the country's biggest mass kidnappings in recent years. The students

Nigeria.title: Burkina Faso accuses Nigerian Air Force of violating its airspace
Nigeria.description: Nigeria denies the violation saying the aircraft made an emergency landing due to a technical issue.

Tanzania.title: Tanzania crackdown on planned protest leaves streets deserted
Tanzania.description: There is a large police presence in major cities and the authorities have encouraged people to stay home.

Egypt.title: World Cup 2026: Iran objects to ‘Pride Match’ branding for Egypt game
Egypt.description: Iran's football boss has labelled World Cup game chosen by organisers as an LGBTQ 'Pride Match' as an 'irrational move'.
